mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, portrait, phone, permission) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{portrait}, #{phone}, #{permission})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}
SELECT portrait FROM user WHERE uid = #{uid}

SELECT user.uid, user.username, user.password, user.sex, user.info, user.birthday, user.portrait, user.phone, r.role_id, r.role_name FROM user LEFT JOIN user_role ON user.uid = user_role.user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id = user_role.role_id WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, info = #{info} WHERE uid = #{uid}
UPDATE user SET password = #{password} WHERE phone = #{phone}
UPDATE user SET portrait = #{portrait} WHERE uid = #{uid}
